ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR( ispickval(Status, "Rejected - Return to Nurture Stream"), ispickval(Status, "Rejected - Disqualify") ),
OR( ispickval (Lead_Stage__c, "MQO"), ispickval (Lead_Stage__c, "SAO") ),
OR( ISBLANK( Disposition_Comments__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Disposition Comments are required when rejecting a Lead in the MQO or SAO Lead Stage. Please add Disposition comments and save your changes.
